mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT S.*, P.EMAIL, P.NAME PRONM, P.TEL, G.*, LISTAGG(L.SUMMARY, '~') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY L.WKCODE) OVER (PARTITION BY S.NO) AS SUMMARY FROM SUBJECT S, PROFESSOR P, LECTUREPLAN L, GRADERATIO G WHERE S.NO = L.SBJNO AND S.NO = G.NO AND S.PFNO = P.NO AND S.NO IN (SELECT NO FROM SUBJECT WHERE NO = #{sbjNo})
SELECT l.* FROM lectureplan l WHERE sbjno = #{sbjno} ORDER BY wkcode
